verse: 9:1 Ssiri wa ddembe? ssirimutume? ssaalaba Yesu Mukama waffe? mmwe temuli mulimu gwange mu Mukama waffe?
2 Oba nga ssiri mu tume eri abalala, naye ndi mutume eri mmwe: kubanga mmwe kabonero k'obutume bwange mu Mukama waffe.
3 Bwe mpoza bwe ati eri abo aban kemereza.
4 Tetulina buyinza okulyanga n'okunywanga?
5 Tetiilina buyinza okutwalanga omukazi ow'oluganda awamu naffe, era ng'abatume abalala, ne baganda ba Mukama waffe, ne Keefa.
6 Oba nze nzekka neBalunabba tetulina buyinza obutakolanga mirimu?
7 An.i agenda okutabaala yonna yonna n'atabaaza ebintu bye ye? ani asimba olusuku n'atalya ku mmere yaamu? oba ani alunda ekisibo n'atanywa ku mata g'ekisibo ekyo?
8 Ebyo ajogera bya buntu? oba era n'amateeka tegoogera bwe gatyo?
9 Kubanga kyawandiikibwa mu mateeka ga Musa ati Togisibanga kamwa ente ng'ewuula. Katonda alowooza bya nte?
10 oba ayogera ku Iwaffe fekka? Kubanga kyawandiikibwa ku lwaffe: kubanga alima lumngwaniraokulima ng'asuubira, era n'awuula kimugwanira okuwuula ng'asuubira okuweebwako.
11 Oba nga ffe twabasigamu eby'omwoyo, kya kitalo ffe bwe tulikungula ebyammwe eby'omubiri?
12 Oba nga abalala balina obuyinza obwo ku mmwe, ffe tetusinga bo? Naye tetwakoza buyinza obwo; naye tugumiikiriza bYonna, tulemenga okuleeta ekiziyiza enjiri ya Kristo.
13 Temumanyi ng'abo abaweereza ebitukuvu balya ku by'omu yeekaalu, n'abo abaweereza ku kyoto bagabana n'ekyoto?
14 Era n e Mukama waffe bw'atyo yalagira ababuuiira enjiri baliisibwenga olw'enjiri.
15 Naye nze sibikozanga ebyo n'ekimu: so siwandiise ebya kiryoke kinkolerwenga nze bwe kityo kubanga waakiri nze okufa, okusinga omuatu yenna okufuula okwenyumiriza kwange okw'obwereere.
16 Kubanga bwe mbuulira enjiri, siba na kya kwenyumiriza;kubanga nnina okuwalirizibwa; kubanga zinsanze, bwe ssibuulira njiri.
17 Kuba oba nga nkola bwe ntyo n'okwagala, mbeera n'empeera: naye oba nga ssikola na kwagala, nnateresebwa obuwanika.
18 Kale mpeera ki gye nnina? Mbuulira enjiri okugifuula ey'obwereere, nneme okukoleza ddala obuyinza bwange mu njiri.
19 Kuba newakubadde nga ndi wa ddembe eri bon na, nneefuula muddu eri bonna, ndyoke nfunenga abangi.
20 N'eri Abayudaaya nnafuuka nga Omuyudaaya; nfunenga Abayudaaya; eri abo abafugibwa amateeka nnafuuka ng'afugibwa amateeka, nze kennyini nga sifugibwa mateeka, nfunenga abafugibwa amateeka;
21 eri abatalina mateeka nnafuuka ng'atalina mateeka, si butaba na mateeka eri Katonda, naye nga mpuiira amateeka eri Kristo, nfunenga abatalina mateeka.
22 Eri abanafu nnafuuka munafu, nfunenga abanafu: eri bonna nfuuse byonna, mu byonna byonna adyoke ndokolenga abamu.
23 Era nkola byonna olw'enjiri, ndyoke nzisenga kimu mu yo.
24 Temumanyi ng'abadduka mu kuwakana baddukanira ddala bonna, naye aweebwako empeera omu? Muddukenga bwe mutyo mulyoke muweebwe.
25 Era buli muntu awakana yeegendereza mu byonna. Kale bo bakola bwe batyo balyoke baweebwe engule eryonooneka, naye ffe etayonooneka.
26 Nze kyenva nzirukabwe nti, si ng'atamanyi; nnwana bwe nti si ng'akuba ebbanga:
27 naye nneebonereza omubiri gwange era ngufuga: mpozzi, nga maze okubuulira abalala, nze nzekka nneme okubeera atasiimibwa.
